General.Name: Advantis Corp
General.Description: Advantis Corp. develops and markets products focusing on medical cannabis, research, and pharmaceutical sectors. The company offers pain management and healthcare solutions. Advantis Corp. was formerly known as Ramoil Management, Ltd. and changed its name to Advantis Corp. in December 2015. Advantis Corp. is based in Newport Beach, California.
General.Address: 1048 Irvine Avenue, Newport Beach, CA, United States, 92660
